00462     public function loadData( $sUserId = null, $sScreenName = null, $bAuthorized = false, $arToken = array() )
00463     {
00464         $this->userId = $sUserId;
00465         $this->screenName = $sScreenName;
00466         $this->isAuthorized = $bAuthorized;
00467         $this->storeToken( $arToken );
00468     }

00670     public function isFollowing( $sFolloweeId, $sFollowerId = null )
00671     {
00672         $this->apiToUse = self::FRIENDSHIP_API;
00673         return $this->makeRequest( 'exists', array( 'user_a' => ( null == $sFollowerId ) ? $this->userId : $sFollowerId, 'user_b' => $sFolloweeId ) );

00880     public function search( $sTerm, $sCallback = null, $sLang = null, $iRPP = null, $iPage = null, $sSinceId = null, $sGeocode = null, $bShowUser = false )
00881     {
00882         $this->apiToUse = self::SEARCH_API;
00883         return $this->makeRequest( '/', array( 'q' => $sTerm, 'callback' => $sCallback, 'lang' => $sLang, 'rpp' => $iRPP, 'page' => $iPage, 'since_id' => $sSinceId, 'geogode' => $sGeocode, 'show_user' => $bShowUser ) );
00884     }
00885 
00886     //********************************************************************************
00887     //* Private Methods
00888     //********************************************************************************
00889 
00899     protected function addTwitterRequestMapping( $sAction, $arParams = null, $arOptions = null, $sController = null )
00900     {
00901         //  Save for next call
00902         static $_sLastController;
00903 
00904         //  Set up statics so next call can omit those parameters.
00905         if ( null != $sController && $sController != $_sLastController )
00906             $_sLastController = $sController;
00907 
00908         //  Add the mapping...
00909         if ( null == $_sLastController )
00910             return false;
00911 
00912         //  Add mapping...
00913         $_arOptions =& $this->getOptions();
00914         $_arOptions[ 'requestMap' ][ $_sLastController ][ $sAction ] = array( 'params' => $arParams, 'options' => $arOptions, 'controller' => $_sLastController );
00915 
00916         return true;
00917     }
00918
